special_features: Best performance-to-cost ratio in voyage-4 series
Highest batch throughput (1M tokens per batch)
Multiple output data types (float, int8, uint8, binary, ubinary)
Compatible with all voyage-4 series embeddings

python.notes: Successfully returned 1024-dimensional embedding using voyageai package

typescript.notes: Successfully returned 1024-dimensional embedding using voyageai package

code_examples.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.voyageai.com/v1/embeddings" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer $VOYAGE_API_KEY" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d '{
        "model": "voyage-4-lite",
        "input": "Your text to embed"
    }'
code_examples.python:
import voyageai

client = voyageai.Client(api_key="your-api-key")

result = client.embed(
    texts=["Your text to embed"],
    model="voyage-4-lite"
)

print(f"Embedding dimensions: {len(result.embeddings[0])}")
print(f"Total tokens: {result.total_tokens}")
